      • isAlphaCarbonStructure

        public static boolean isAlphaCarbonStructure​(Structure structure)
        Returns true iff the given Structure consists only of alpha carbon atoms (this may include hydrogen atoms).
        Parameters:
        structure - The Structure to check.
        Returns:
        True iff structure contains only alpha carbon atoms.

      • isBackboneStructure

        public static boolean isBackboneStructure​(Structure structure)
        Returns true iff the given Structure consists only of backbone atoms (this may include beta carbon and hydrogen atoms).
        Parameters:
        structure - The Structure to check.
        Returns:
        True iff structure contains only backbone and hydrogen atoms.

      • calculateTorsionAngle

        public static double calculateTorsionAngle​(Atom a,
                                           Atom b,
                                           Atom c,
                                           Atom d)
        Calculated the torsion angle between the given Atoms. The order of the given atoms is important.
        Parameters:
        a - Atom 1.
        b - Atom 2.
        c - Atom 3.
        d - Atom 4.
        Returns:
        The torsion angle in degrees.

      • renumberStructure

        public static OakStructure renumberStructure​(OakStructure structure,
                                             java.util.Map<LeafIdentifier,​java.lang.Integer> renumberingMap)
        Renumbers the LeafSubstructures in a given OakStructure according to a renumbering map. Warning:The method copies only the parts of the structure which are covered by the renumbering map. Non-consecutive parts of the structure (ligands, etc.) are not affected and copied to the new structure.
        Parameters:
        structure - The OakStructure to be renumbered.
        renumberingMap - The renumbering map, containing as key original LeafIdentifiers the renumbered serial as values.
        Returns:
        A copy of the structure, renumbered according to the given map.

      • getClosestDistance

        public static double getClosestDistance​(AtomContainer atomContainer1,
                                        AtomContainer atomContainer2)
        Returns the closest distance between two AtomContainers or NaN if computation fails.
        Parameters:
        atomContainer1 - First AtomContainer.
        atomContainer2 - Second AtomContainer.
        Returns:
        The closest distance.
